title: Project-Based Education Utilizing a Matrix Model for Integrating School Education and Scientific Research

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational curriculum design experience and basic project management concepts
context.additional_context: Focuses on designing science research management models applicable to real school environments for adult learners, strengthening collaboration and data analysis skills via digital tools.

learning_goals: Learners can create and present a school-research institution collaboration project design document applying a matrix model.
Learners can develop a PBL (Project-Based Learning) activity assessment rubric to enhance students' research experiences.
Can derive at least three quantitative/qualitative indicators for measuring integrated education-research outcomes
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
